content.text: Match ends, Valencia 2, Espanyol 2.
Second Half ends, Valencia 2, Espanyol 2.
Substitution, Espanyol. Raúl Rodríguez replaces Abraham González.
Substitution, Espanyol. Víctor Álvarez replaces Simão.
Attempt saved. Ricardo Costa (Valencia) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Jeremy Mathieu with a headed pass.
Corner,  Valencia. Conceded by Héctor Moreno.
Offside, Valencia. João Pereira tries a through ball, but Jonas is caught offside.
Foul by Álex Fernández (Espanyol).
Oriol Romeu (Valencia) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Valencia. Dorlan Pabón replaces Paco Alcácer.
